data.title: Company Profile
data.meta_description: SonicWALL - Provider of firewall based network security solutions. Acquired by Francisco Partners. Raised funding over 1 round from 5 investors. Founded by Sreekanth Ravi and Sudhakar Ravi in the year 1991. SonicWALL has 282 competitors.

SonicWALL - About the company

What does SonicWALL do?

SonicWALL is a provider of firewall based network security solutions. It provides network security, email security, business continuity, and secure mobile access to dynamically secure, control, and scale the global networks. It uses input from various shared touchpoints to deliver continuous communication, feedback, and analysis of the nature and behavior of threats. The features include universal threat management, VPN, backup and recovery, anti spam for email.

Which sectors and market segments does SonicWALL operate in?

SonicWALL serves in the B2B space .

SonicWALL's acquisition details

SonicWALL got acquired by Francisco Partners and Elliott Management on Jun 20, 2016. It was facilitated by Houlihan Capital .

Click here to take a look at SonicWALL 's acquisition in detail

SonicWALL's funding and investors

How much funding has SonicWALL raised till date?

SonicWALL has raised funding over 1 round.

What are the most recent funding rounds of SonicWALL?

Its latest funding round was a Post IPO round on Jun 16, 2021 for an undisclosed amount. 1 investor participated in its latest round, which include Gremio FBPA.

SonicWALL's founders and board of directors

Founder? Claim Profile

Who are the founders of SonicWALL?

The founders of SonicWALL are Sreekanth Ravi and Sudhakar Ravi. Sreekanth Ravi has founded 1 more compan y - Code Green Networks. Sudhakar Ravi has founded 1 more compan y - Code Green Networks.

Who is the current CEO of SonicWALL?

Sreekanth Ravi is the CEO of SonicWALL .

SonicWALL's Competitors and alternates

Competitive landscape of SonicWALL

SonicWALL ranks 13 th among 282 competitors which include FireEye, Palo Alto Networks and Rapid7. 31 of its competitors are funded while 40 have exited. Overall, SonicWALL and its competitors have raised over $2.36B in funding across 151 funding rounds involving 353 investors. There is 1 private unicorn, 17 public and 23 acquired companies in the entire competition set.
